name: DragonBox Algebra 12+
summary:
Build a Greater Understanding of Algebra
With more levels and more advanced equations Algebra 12+ moves beyond its critically acclaimed predecessor, Algebra 5+.

More Levels & Harder Equations
Algebra 5+ gave us the basics, now comes the hard part. In Algebra 12+ you deep dive into advanced algebraic concepts.

Covered in the App: Addition, Division, Multiplication, Parentheses, Positive/Negative Signs, Addition of Fractions (Common Denominator), Collection of Like Terms, factorization, Substitution.
